answer: In my experience I've found quite a few travellers with guitars so it's fairly common. Most seemed to use some form of rocket atttached to the back but fuel for this is hard to come by in certain areas of the world and often requires FAA approval to use in the States. No seriously lots of people do and much like travelling with a snowboard it generally just goes into the oversize baggage area often at no extra cost to you. This is both domestic and international. But it's definitely important to check with your airline as everyone has different rules I'd hate to know what RyanAir would do to you if you tried with them
